definition: to reveal the cloven foot (idiom); to unmask one's true nature/to give the game away
dew/syrup/nectar/outdoors (not under cover)/to show/to reveal/to betray/to expose
surname Lu
to show/to reveal/to betray/to expose

to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks
variant of 角[jue2]/role

sentences.english: Parliamentary debate would supposedly give the game away.
sentences.chinese: 議會辯論可能會露出馬腳。

sentences.english: Oh, you've finally got on the track, Mr.
sentences.chinese: 哈哈，你終於露出馬腳了，歐先生。

sentences.english: Fine clothes may disguise, but silly words will disclose a fool.
sentences.chinese: 漂亮的外衣可以包裝傻瓜，但蠢話總會露出馬腳。

sentences.english: If you are traveling alone, try to hide that fact.
sentences.chinese: 如果你是單獨出行，可千萬別露出馬腳。

sentences.english: Perfectly passable inexpensive pieces are given away time and again by their crappy buttons.
sentences.chinese: 廉價的還可以讓衣服屢次被它們糟糕的扣子露出馬腳。

sentences.english: But at these prices, it is difficult to avoid a paper trail.
sentences.chinese: 但是，以這樣的價錢，很難不在個人賬面上露出馬腳。

definition: to exaggerate
toy gun
variant of 矇騙|蒙骗[meng1 pian4]
to play deaf-mute
to smash
lit. the river that divides Chu and Han/fig. a line that divides rival territories/the mid-line between sides on a Chinese chessboard
daring/presumptuous/daredevil
to ignore/to brush off/to dismiss/to pay no attention to
clever and eloquent (idiom); fluent/having the gift of the gab
to evade responsibility/to shirk
the trick of injuring oneself to gain the enemy's confidence/CL:條|条[tiao2]
lit. wind past your ear/fig. sth you don't pay much attention to/in one ear and out the other
When you enter a country, follow the local customs (idiom); do as the natives do/When in Rome, do as the Romans do
(to act) on one's own initiative
conciliation/mediation/to mollify/to propitiate/to reconcile
abbr. for 國家安全局|国家安全局[Guo2 jia1 An1 quan2 ju2]
